fields.label: Enable Google Search
fields.description: When enabled, the model can use Google Search to answer questions about recent events or topics.

fields.label: Show Thinking
fields.description: When enabled, the model's thinking process will be displayed in the chat window before the final answer.

fields.label: URL Blacklist
fields.description: A list of URLs or domains to blacklist, one per line. Any URL containing one of these strings will be blocked.

fields.label: Contact Confidence Threshold
fields.description: The confidence level required to automatically select a contact when searching by name (0.0 to 1.0).

fields.label: DocTypes for Embedding
fields.description: Select the DocTypes that should be indexed for semantic search.

fields.label: Queryable DocTypes
fields.description: Select the DocTypes that the AI is allowed to query using the 'fetch_erpnext_data' tool.

fields.label: Embedding Field Weights
fields.description: Define weights for specific fields to give them more importance in the embedding.
